about_the_game:
Zipp's Café is a bite-sized cafe management sim with a noir-like story and cozy atmosphere.

Can you really change? Can you escape your past? Can you find love? Can you handle betrayal? But most importantly... can you make the best coffee in all the Wilderness?



  • Zipp's Café is a bittersweet little story of what we have to sacrifice to make a real difference in our lives while meeting extraordinary characters and preparing unusual recipes at the boiling edge of the cities of insects and animals.

  • Meet 5 strange characters and discover what connects them. Talk to them, and - whether you like it or not - get caught up in their lives. Immerse yourself into 3 minigames with completely different moods and mechanics. Brew the most special coffees or teas, prepare unique meals, and... wash the dishes... (Because someone has to do the dishes too, you know.)

  • Play in color, or in glorious NOIR mode!



WORLD OF WILDERNESS


The 'World of Wilderness' is a world and a brand, home to many different stories across multiple ages, and is constantly growing. Check our other games set in this universe:

Zipp's Café is a precursor to the upcoming epic animal-noir-adventure:
Chicken Police - Into the HIVE!


...and it has an award-winning prelude too:


Not to mention a just-announced detective adventure:


Have fun playing Zipp's Café! - The Wild Gentlemen

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains descriptions and references to violence and alcohol.

Zipp's Café is a bite-sized cafe management sim with a noir-like story and cozy atmosphere.

Can you really change? Can you escape your past? Can you find love? Can you handle betrayal? But most importantly... can you make the best coffee in all the Wilderness?



  • Zipp's Café is a bittersweet little story of what we have to sacrifice to make a real difference in our lives while meeting extraordinary characters and preparing unusual recipes at the boiling edge of the cities of insects and animals.

Immerse yourself into 3 minigames with completely different moods and mechanics. Brew the most special coffees or teas, prepare unique meals, and... wash the dishes... linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.6ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM: Intel HD 3000 GPU / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.6ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

name: Zipp's Café

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.6ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM: Intel HD 3000 GPU / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU - 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 / AMD R7 370

reviews:
“jump into Zipp’s Café for the noir vibes and wonderful characters, but stay for the utterly enjoyable drink and food-making”
GameSpew

“the developer just loves their world and characters so very much."”
Destructoid

“The game has more energy than a double espresso and is as addictive as that third cup of coffee you probably shouldn’t have had”
Geek Network
short_description: Love, betrayal, and coffee! Zipp's Café is a "noir & chill" little game about a café between the city of animals and the district of insects. Make unusual recipes, get involved in shady dealings, and try to start a new life while searching for love and revenge.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Hungarian, Russian
*languages with full audio support
